events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been classified under the Refund cluster based on the request for money back.
Assigning the case to Refund Specialist Agent John for further assistance and resolution.
Hello, I’m John from customer support. I understand you want a refund for the incorrect item received. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the wrong item you received so we can process the refund quickly?
Here is my order number 12345 and the attached photo shows that instead of the blue jacket, I received a black backpack.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate the prompt refund process and the return label.
The refund has been processed and you should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
Just following up to ensure that your refund was received and that everything with your case is now resolved satisfactorily.
Since we have not heard further from you and the refund process is complete, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
